TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrintJobException extends System.Printing.PrintSystemException

summary.span: 在打印作业没有正确运行时发生的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurs when the print job does not run correctly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.
